name: Chemtrails
description:
Our submission for Ludum Dare 42 - Running Out Of Space

Chemtrails is a game where you and up to three buddies have to stop the disease.

As you drive you leave chemtrails behind which are used to stop the spread of the matching colour disease.

Control using Keyboard and Xbox360 (driver) Controllers

====== CONTROLS: ======

  • Space  ||  A     :  Accept
  • Esc  ||  Start   :   Pause
Player1Arrow Keys
D-PadPlayer 2
WASDD-Pad
Player 3
D-Pad
Player 4
D-Pad
